h2. scen_gen: an example of C++ client

h4. Short characteristics:
* uses gSoap for automatic generation of headers and DTOs (Data Transfer Objects)
* uses a WS to get the SMS of the tiny test model (id == 71)
* the SMS is stored in the automatically generated DTOs
* prints the DTO to stdout

h4. Documentation is available in the enrima-dev4/kernel/docs directory
